definition: code of conduct/conventions/common practice/routine (medical procedure etc)

sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大戰與地面常規作戰之間有着密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: A complex short circuit capacity method is proposed as an alternative to the per unit method.
sentences.chinese: 複數短路容量法可替代常規的標麼值法。

sentences.english: However, Group B patients enjoyed conventional care instead of special care.
sentences.chinese: 乙組按常規護理，不對照顧者進行特殊施教。

sentences.english: The bursts have much more energy than the normal local variations in temperature.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的爆發具備相比常規溫變強大的多的能量。

sentences.english: Thus, high-dose rate after-loading intracavitary therapy can be used to replace conventional radium therapy.
sentences.chinese: 所以高劑量率後裝治療可以代替常規鐳療。

sentences.english: The immunity serum titer was mensurated by the routine ELISA.
sentences.chinese: 常規ELISA法測定免疫血清效價。

sentences.english: The bath also performs general laboratory applications, such as incubation and sample tempering.
sentences.chinese: 浴槽也可用於如孵育和樣品保溫等類常規實驗。

sentences.english: They are not afraid to break with convention.
Once the staging area is empty, secondary resumes normal operation.
sentences.chinese: 一旦暫存區域爲空，次要服務器就會恢復常規操作。

sentences.english: You want an exceptional experience, not just an average one.
sentences.chinese: 你想要一個超常的體驗，而不僅僅是常規的。

sentences.english: Use a regular, corded telephone when at home or at work.
sentences.chinese: 在家或工作時使用常規有繩電話。

sentences.english: He had many elegancies of his own, whilst he scoffed at conventional elegance.
sentences.chinese: 他本人便具備很多優雅，儘管他在譏笑常規的優雅。

sentences.english: Main transmission system in machine-tool can be divided into two types: regular and irregular speed-change.
sentences.chinese: 機牀主傳動系統有常規變速和非常規變速兩種。

sentences.english: Main transmission system in machine-tool can be divided into two types: regular and irregular speed-change.
sentences.chinese: 機牀主傳動系統有常規變速和非常規變速兩種。

sentences.english: This new stiffened plate element has the same degree of freedom as regular plate elements.
sentences.chinese: 任意加筋板單元具有和常規板單元相同的自由度。

sentences.english: Hyoid bone and arytenoid cartilages were resected and cricoid cartilage anastomosis with the base of the tongue and submental muscles.
sentences.chinese: 常規切除舌骨將環狀軟骨與舌根及頦下肌肉吻合。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to make a choice (between several alternatives)/a choice/an option/an alternative
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
